text:
I will thank you Alan. I’ve been running through it and trimming, so far there’s 00:01:30 off so a good chuck so far. It’s very difficult as they’re all very personal clips with the topic. 
I’ve definitely put a lot more thought in to not rendering though. I’d like to render 2/3 shots to treat as hero shots and use to try and get funding for the last push and distribution after I graduate. The visit is already paying off :wink:

Final editing has brought me down to 3 versions of the film. I’m thinking of them as if they’re software versions.
The lite version of the film is 00:04:05 (00:03:29 lip sync)
The standard version of the film is 00:05:06 (00:04:30 lip sync)
The premium version of the film is 00:06:06 (00:05:12 lip sync)
